00026 #include "Base64.hpp"
00027 
00028 static const string base64_chars = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"
00029   "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"
00030   "0123456789+/";
00031 
00032 static inline bool is_base64(unsigned char c) {
00033   return (isalnum(c) || (c == '+') || (c == '/'));
00034 }
00035 
00036 string Utils::Base64::base64_encode(unsigned char const* bytes_to_encode,
00037     unsigned int in_len) {
00038   string ret;
00039   int i = 0;
00040   int j = 0;
00041   unsigned char char_array_3[3];
00042   unsigned char char_array_4[4];
00043 
00044   while (in_len--) {
00045     char_array_3[i++] = *(bytes_to_encode++);
00046     if (i == 3) {
00047       char_array_4[0] = (char_array_3[0] & 0xfc) >> 2;
00048       char_array_4[1] = ((char_array_3[0] & 0x03) << 4) + ((char_array_3[1]
00049           & 0xf0) >> 4);
00050       char_array_4[2] = ((char_array_3[1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((char_array_3[2]
00051           & 0xc0) >> 6);
00052       char_array_4[3] = char_array_3[2] & 0x3f;
00053 
00054       for (i = 0; (i < 4); i++)
00055         ret += base64_chars[char_array_4[i]];
00056       i = 0;
00057     }
00058   }
00059 
00060   if (i) {
00061     for (j = i; j < 3; j++)
00062       char_array_3[j] = '\0';
00063 
00064     char_array_4[0] = (char_array_3[0] & 0xfc) >> 2;
00065     char_array_4[1] = ((char_array_3[0] & 0x03) << 4) + ((char_array_3[1]
00066         & 0xf0) >> 4);
00067     char_array_4[2] = ((char_array_3[1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((char_array_3[2]
00068         & 0xc0) >> 6);
00069     char_array_4[3] = char_array_3[2] & 0x3f;
00070 
00071     for (j = 0; (j < i + 1); j++)
00072       ret += base64_chars[char_array_4[j]];
00073 
00074     while ((i++ < 3))
00075       ret += '=';
00076 
00077   }
00078 
00079   return ret;
00080 
00081 }

00083 string Utils::Base64::base64_decode(string const& encoded_string) {
00084   int in_len = encoded_string.size();
00085   int i = 0;
00086   int j = 0;
00087   int in_ = 0;
00088   unsigned char char_array_4[4], char_array_3[3];
00089   string ret;
00090 
00091   while (in_len-- && (encoded_string[in_] != '=') && is_base64(
00092       encoded_string[in_])) {
00093     char_array_4[i++] = encoded_string[in_];
00094     in_++;
00095     if (i == 4) {
00096       for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00097         char_array_4[i] = base64_chars.find(char_array_4[i]);
00098 
00099       char_array_3[0] = (char_array_4[0] << 2)
00100           + ((char_array_4[1] & 0x30) >> 4);
00101       char_array_3[1] = ((char_array_4[1] & 0xf) << 4) + ((char_array_4[2]
00102           & 0x3c) >> 2);
00103       char_array_3[2] = ((char_array_4[2] & 0x3) << 6) + char_array_4[3];
00104 
00105       for (i = 0; (i < 3); i++)
00106         ret += char_array_3[i];
00107       i = 0;
00108     }
00109   }
00110 
00111   if (i) {
00112     for (j = i; j < 4; j++)
00113       char_array_4[j] = 0;
00114 
00115     for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00116       char_array_4[j] = base64_chars.find(char_array_4[j]);
00117 
00118     char_array_3[0] = (char_array_4[0] << 2) + ((char_array_4[1] & 0x30) >> 4);
00119     char_array_3[1] = ((char_array_4[1] & 0xf) << 4)
00120         + ((char_array_4[2] & 0x3c) >> 2);
00121     char_array_3[2] = ((char_array_4[2] & 0x3) << 6) + char_array_4[3];
00122 
00123     for (j = 0; (j < i - 1); j++)
00124       ret += char_array_3[j];
00125   }
00126 
00127   return ret;
00128 }
